data.title: RM&C Consultants Ltd
data.meta_description: Oliver is one of the original partners at RM&C Consultants alongside Mike Pooleman and continues to provide invaluable insight in the direction of the business.
data.text:
Oliver is one of the original partners at RM&C Consultants alongside Mike Pooleman and continues to provide invaluable insight in the direction of the business.

â€‹

Fun fact: Oliver enjoys holidaying in far reaching countries and getting out in the countryside on his bicycle.

Graduating from Ealing Hotel Academy, Oliver became the catering manager for HMS Belfast, then a City Livery Company and in 1976 10 & 11 Downing Street, Carlton Gardens, Lancaster House and Admiralty House.

From 1977, Oliver progressed from managing major contracts in the City of London to all the staff feeding at Gatwick airport before becoming an area manager. In 1989, he became operations director for a privately owned contractor being responsible for many 'Blue Chip' professional companies in London.

In 1995 he became UK operations director for another major contract caterer. In 2003 Oliver joined Mike Pooleman as a director of RM&C Consultants Ltd and specialises in consultancy for contract catering and cleaning in business & industry, local authorities, Academies and the higher education market.
